feed.title: Track Awesome Android Updates Weekly

entry.title: Awesome Android Updates on Oct 28 - Nov 03, 2019
entry.content:
Chat & Messaging / ORM

  • Stream Chat - Comprehensive SDK & Components for real-time chat, powered by Stream.

Runtime Permissions / Custom Dialog

  • Ask-Permission (⭐77) - Simple RunTime permission manager.
  • Gota (⭐71) - Simplifying Android Permissions.
  • EasyPermissions (⭐9.9k) - EasyPermissions is a wrapper library to simplify basic system permissions logic when targeting Android M or higher.

Podcasts / Custom Dialog

  • Android Authority is a weekly Android podcast hosted by Adam Doud, Joe Hindy, and Jonathan Feist from the Android Authority team.

entry.title: Awesome Android Updates on Oct 21 - Oct 27, 2019
entry.content:
Data binding

  • Anvil (⭐1.4k) - A small library to create reactive UI components, inspired by React. Provides data binding and event listener binding, fits well for MVVM.

GUI / Inputs

  • EmojiCompat (⭐706) - Adds emoticons to your app

GUI / Loading Images

  • Coil (⭐11k) - Image loading for Android backed by Kotlin Coroutines.

GUI / Media Picker

  • Android Image Picker (⭐1.1k) - A library that makes images and videos selection from gallery feels easy. It also support GIF and simple camera action

Code examples / Custom Dialog

  • Android Architecture Blueprints (⭐45k) - The Android Architecture Blueprints project demonstrates strategies to help solve or avoid common android problems.

entry.title: Awesome Android Updates on Aug 26 - Sep 01, 2019
entry.content:
GUI

  • OneAdapter (⭐470) - RecyclerView Adapter with multiple modules and hooks to simplify and enhance the use while preventing common mistakes.

Chat & Messaging / ORM

  • Build a one-on-one Android chat app using Kotlin - Build a one-one-one Android chat app in Kotlin within few minutes using CometChat Pro. This tutorial discusses the features such as login, getting list of contacts, user presence indicators, sending/receiving messages etc.
entry.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Aug 26 - Sep 01, 2019

entry.title: Awesome Android Updates on Aug 19 - Aug 25, 2019
entry.content:
REST / ORM

  • Retrofit - Retrofit turns your REST API into a Java interface.

Chat & Messaging / ORM

  • CometChat Voice, Video and Text Chat SDK with UI (⭐5) - Add voice, video and text chat to your app (and website) in minutes using CometChat. CometChat's SDK includes a complete ready UI so that you don't have to spend any time building one! That's not all, CometChat has out-of-the-box support for real-time translation, whiteboards, screen sharing, friends sync, role based access control, credits deduction and more.

Resources / Custom Dialog

  • Google Developers Training - Google Developers Official Training page has list of various useful learning resources for beginner as well seasoned developer.
  • AndroidVille - Become a better Android Engineer. A website dedicated to Android Development covering advanced topics such as RxJava, Android Zygote and much more.

More lists of libraries / Custom Dialog

  • Square libraries - Multiple high quality libraries by square.
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Aug 19 - Aug 25, 2019
